## Quick Install

### Option 1: APT Repository (recommended for automatic updates)

```bash
# Add GPG key and repository
curl -fsSL https://scopecreep-zip.github.io/open-sesame/gpg.key \
  | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/open-sesame.gpg
echo "deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/open-sesame.gpg] https://scopecreep-zip.github.io/open-sesame noble main" \
  | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/open-sesame.list

# Install and configure
sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y open-sesame
sesame --setup-keybinding
```

### Option 2: Direct Download (this release)

**amd64 (Intel/AMD):**
```bash
curl -fsSL https://github.com/ScopeCreep-zip/open-sesame/releases/download/${TAG}/open-sesame_${VERSION}_amd64.deb \
  -o /tmp/open-sesame.deb
gh attestation verify /tmp/open-sesame.deb --owner ScopeCreep-zip
sudo dpkg -i /tmp/open-sesame.deb
sesame --setup-keybinding
```

**arm64 (Apple Silicon, Raspberry Pi, etc.):**
```bash
curl -fsSL https://github.com/ScopeCreep-zip/open-sesame/releases/download/${TAG}/open-sesame_${VERSION}_arm64.deb \
  -o /tmp/open-sesame.deb
gh attestation verify /tmp/open-sesame.deb --owner ScopeCreep-zip
sudo dpkg -i /tmp/open-sesame.deb
sesame --setup-keybinding
```

## What You Get

After running `sesame --setup-keybinding`:

- **Alt+Space** - Opens the window switcher overlay with letter hints
- **Alt+Tab** - Quick-switches to your previous window

Press any hint letter to instantly focus that window. That's it.

## Supply Chain Security

Every `.deb` in this release includes [SLSA Build Provenance](https://slsa.dev/) attestations generated by GitHub Actions. Verify before installing:

```bash
gh attestation verify open-sesame_*.deb --owner ScopeCreep-zip
```
